# Engineering Documentation Templates

Templates for creating technical documentation for engineering teams.

## Available Templates

- [API Documentation Template](./api-documentation-template.md) - For documenting APIs and endpoints
- [Architecture Document Template](./architecture-template.md) - For system architecture documentation
- [Development Guide Template](./development-guide-template.md) - For step-by-step development guides
- [Troubleshooting Guide Template](./troubleshooting-template.md) - For documenting common issues and solutions
- [Code Review Template](./code-review-template.md) - For standardizing code review documentation
- [Release Notes Template](./release-notes-template.md) - For documenting product releases

## Usage Guidelines

### When to Use Each Template

- **API Documentation**: When documenting REST APIs, GraphQL schemas, or SDKs
- **Architecture Document**: When documenting system design, infrastructure, or technical decisions
- **Development Guide**: When creating step-by-step instructions for developers
- **Troubleshooting Guide**: When documenting common issues, errors, and their solutions
- **Code Review**: When documenting code review processes and checklists
- **Release Notes**: When documenting new features, bug fixes, and changes in releases

### General Tips

- Include code examples with syntax highlighting
- Add diagrams using Mermaid for complex concepts
- Link to related documentation
- Keep examples up-to-date with codebase changes
- Include prerequisites and assumptions
